item.title: Is Ruby on Rails Still Relevant in 2021
item.description: You have been thinking of learning Ruby on Rails in 2021. You even started tinkering with Ruby and you love how quirky, dynamic and fun it makes you feel. But then, it’s not long until you encounter these type of discussion: And you start questioning yourself: “What if RoR is a dying domain? Will I be better going with Python, Go or even with the traditional web dev JS road?”

item.title: How to Become Confident - Tips & Books
item.description: I believed I had to had born confident. And I wasn’t, so why keep trying? How happy I am to have been wrong about that! This post brings some tips from the book “The Confidence Code: The Science and Art of Self-Assurance - What women should know”. And some lessons from my Cognitive Behaviour Therapy sessions. Ready? ðŸš€ How to practice Self-Confidence When in doubt, ACT. Decide. What kills overconfidence is overthinking.
